attributes.review: after downloading the app donald trump himself flew to my house completely destroying it. after finding out i’m hispanic he broke my back and spit in my face. honestly i was traumatized. now i’m paralyzed with no arms or legs and right now i’m typing this with my nose. the second time i opened this app my phone blew up and i have first degree burns all over my body and it killed my dog. i got a new ohone and downloaded it again trying for a third time and it started flashing lights and my epilepsy said no way and i fainted into a blender cutting off all my hair. after these failed attempts i have decided i do not support trump or this app 🤬🤬
attributes.title: just no

attributes.review: I would like to say, this app gave me nightmares! i am disgusted by whoever made this app. who in their right mind would make an app based on a cheeto? i have never had a nightmare in my life, but after downloading this cursed app i kept on having weird nightmares about a cheeto man eating the earth and devouring everything. this wouldn’t have happened if you imbeciles didn’t make this app! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: DISGUSTING!

attributes.review: If I could leave 0 stars I would. I downloaded the app and instead of getting information on politics it gave me an STD. I don’t know how but just like the Virgin Mary it gave me something I couldn’t give back. My parents kicked me out of the house and now I’m forced to live on the streets. My phone has a virus and my dog won’t even look at me. Would not recommend
attributes.title: Awful!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could see when my favorite Cheeto dust covered president would crawl out of his bunker to greet the world at one of his amazing rallies🥰 but when I got into the app it was bug city, someone call the exterminator cause I see roaches (and not the good kind that black people are still arrested for possessing🍁). Anyways don’t download this app, but arrest the cops that killed Breonna Taylor.
attributes.title: Just Horrible🤮

attributes.review:
So I opened the app was shocked, like what is this hunny in tears almost. The Cheeto man’s foundation was so disgusting, James Charles would not approve AT ALL. His hair looked worse then my dogs and save Melatonin. 
The Cheeto man has a little dementia moment, they don’t kill presidents like they used to. Over all this app just screams poor and wouldn’t recommend downloading. Vote blue pls, anyone but Cheeto man 2020. The orange needs to rot. ❤️
attributes.title: It’s not worth your space

attributes.review: I got up and saw that my house was gone. I put a elephant in my car then my house was just gone and it disappeared. Then I got my elf on the shelf and put it in the fire place and it was also gone idk where it went. I need to know what happened to my pet tiger. I put him in the oven and he say yes then I put my bird in my McDonald’s suit and when to McDonald’s in my skates then it fly out my head. SO DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: NOO

attributes.review:
This app is really bad. Firstly, it promotes Trump so that’s a no. Secondly, it goes against my religion. Thirdly, I really don’t enjoy having this on my phone because it creates a really bad vibe on my home page. 👀Hopefully no one else downloads this app and leaves a one star review so that this app gets taken off of the app store. 👀That would be so bad.👀 

Anyways I don’t like this app. 0/5 stars.
attributes.title: Glitchy

attributes.review: The agent orange🍊of hate has changed the political landscape of America. I was horrified to see nothing but racism, hate, and disgusting hillbilly behavior in this terrible app. No one should have their eyes land on the face of the Cheeto puff/ fully roasted turkey posing as a leader of any free nation!!!! This app is also riddled with terrible glitches—-I think Ivanka and her dumb, dumb, bubble gum....I wanna be a real boy husband along with dumb as door nails DJTJ designed this app!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!👁💧👄💧👁

attributes.review: i wanted to open this lovely app and vote for Addison Rae 🗿for president but i saw a weird deformed peach. i was scared 🤢at first but as i went through the pages i noticed it said “trümp” and i did some research to see who that is... and i found out it was a cheeto🤩 i zoomed to my mother to tell her what i had seen and she bit me🙃 so i went back to my room and the app is telling me to vote for “ cheeto” 🤡 so instead i ate it🧟‍♂️
attributes.title: Õrãñgëš😍🍑

attributes.review: upon opening the app i was immediately attacked, physically and mentally. the image of a shriveled, fat, Cheeto puff appeared and upon its sight i was immediately sent me into cardiac arrest. after going to the emergency room I had to be airlifted to another hospital. the app also made my phone EXPLODE which led to my house burning down. i am now disabled, homeless, and traumatized. i wish this pain upon no one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF YOU CARE ABOUT YOUR HEALTH💋💋💕
attributes.title: no❤️
